title: Melbourne Based Team LFM
body:
Hey all, 
we're currently recruiting a mid laner and ADC for a competitive team based in Melbourne, with full intention of competing in lans events, as well as open ladder and the potential for ocs/other opportunities with hardwork and dedication. 
Two of our core members have challenger experience, both playing and working within the OCE pro scene. D5 minimum.
Only apply if you're tolerant to work and play as a team, have patience with a non-toxic attitude and are willing to play a minimum of 3 days a week R5s and soloq as you please.
Comment below your - 
IGN: 
IRL name:
Age: 
Availability:
Add Stev or Highdrogen in game and we'll be happy to talk trials, opportunities and any other piques you might have.

replies.poster: S E Y T A N
